title: CLI Chess
description: Developed a fully functional command-line chess game in C++ that supports all standard rules of chess, including piece movement, check, checkmate, castling, en passant, and pawn promotion.

title: AI Chat APP
description: An AI chat application built with Vite and React on the frontend, and Express.js on the backend. It integrates OpenAI's GPT-3.5 to generate dynamic and context-aware responses.

title: Courses Web Scraper
description: Developed a web scraper using cURL and the Gumbo HTML parser to extract course offerings and available majors from the University of Illinois system website.
